fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, eat two people, killing them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You clean targets you kill.
- The following day, learn the roles of people you killed by eating them. You may choose one role to declare delicious, giving you that role's abilities and attributes.
- You may multitask one ability from each role you have declared delicious.
- __**Part of the Daily Streak Faction**__ - If this role is part of the daily streak faction, your eat ability only kills one person, and you may only use one killing ability per night.
